--- Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:


> OOC: I curious how the intruder found the base... he must have
> watched
> them come back in the shuttle and got lucky enough to see where it
> landed.

Actually he was cloaked and came in behind the shuttle while cloaked,
and waited for the others as they ventured inside before he did so. 

You may want to check out all the posts in the subjects: Within Hydras'
Base, The Darkest Hour and Preparing the Abmbush, as we kinda jumped
around inbetween them, and the intruder is no longer typing at the
keyboard. 

Preston
